According to the Homebrew site, to install it, I need to type:

brew install wget I get an error message:

-bash: brew: command not found Found this answer. The problem, however, is I don’t see brew in /usr/local/bin.

I added the below line to my .bashrc file

export PATH=/usr/local/bin:$PATH Still getting the command not found error.

How do I install Homebrew on macOS?

/bin/bash -c “$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/master/install.sh)”
